title: Python Dictionary Data Structure
description: In this challenge, you will practice working with dictionary values in Python by implementing a function that returns a flat list of all the values in a given dictionary.

meta.title: Mastering Python Dictionaries: Unlock the Power of Key-Value Pairs
meta.description: Explore the fundamentals of Python dictionaries and learn how to leverage their versatility in your programming projects.
meta.keywords: python, key value pairs, dictionary, programming, data structure

i18n.title: Python字典数据结构
i18n.description: 在这个挑战中，你将通过实现一个函数来练习处理Python中的字典值，该函数返回给定字典中所有值的扁平列表。

meta.title: 精通Python字典：释放键值对的力量
meta.description: 探索Python字典的基础知识，并学习如何在你的编程项目中利用它们的多功能性。
meta.keywords: Python, 键值对, 字典, 编程, 数据结构
